Class FragmentAnalytics

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.mpagliaro98.mysubscriptions.ui.tabs.FragmentAnalytics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, SavedStateCompatible

    public class FragmentAnalytics
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements SavedStateCompatible
    A fragment containing the view for the analytics tab.

                            android.os.Bundle savedState,
                            android.view.View root)

        root - the root view of this tab

      • calculateAnalytics

        private void calculateAnalytics(android.view.View root,
                                AnalyticsManager analyticsManager)
        Calculate the set of analytics that get displayed in the main layout on the analytics tab. This calculates each analytic, then adds it to its respective view.
        Parameters:
        root - the root view of this tab
        analyticsManager - the object using the model to generate analytics

      • addBreakdownDropdownListener

        private void addBreakdownDropdownListener(android.widget.Spinner breakdownDropdown,
                                          android.view.View root,
                                          AnalyticsManager analyticsManager)
        Adds a listener to the category breakdown dropdown list, which each time it's updated, will re-calculate how much is owed in the selected time period for each category.
        Parameters:
        breakdownDropdown - the dropdown list
        root - the root view of this tab
        analyticsManager - the analytics manager

      • updatePieChart

        private void updatePieChart(android.view.View root,
                            AnalyticsManager analyticsManager)
        Refresh the pie chart and fill it with the breakdown data in the given analytics manager. This will automatically update the chart in the view.
        Parameters:
        root - the root view of this tab
        analyticsManager - the analytics manager
